content.p: Everything you need to know about graduating in 2025 After all your hard work you're almost there! It will soon be time to come together to celebrate your efforts at your graduation ceremony and welcome you to your alumni community. 21 July - 1 August 2025 Ceremony dates and times available end of January 2025 December 2025 You can decide when, where and how you graduate from the three options below. Come and celebrate with us! Check the ceremony dates and times to see when yours is and get planning. If you can't make your ceremony, you can choose to defer and attend your ceremony at a later date. If you choose to defer your graduation, you will not receive your certificate until your chosen graduation date. If you decide not to attend a graduation ceremony, you will graduate in absentia. We will post your certificate to you after the ceremony. Graduation marks the culmination of many years of hard work and dedication from our students. Giving family, friends, and staff at the university the opportunity to congratulate our new graduates and celebrate their achievements. Mark the occasion by sharing your snaps on Instagram and tagging @uniofnottingham #WeAreUoN
